metadata.title: CVE-2021-39371 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An XML external entity (XXE) injection in PyWPS before 4.4.5 allows an attacker to view files on the application server filesystem by assigning a path to the entity. OWSLib 0.24.1 may also be affected.

criterions.comment: pywps package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
